meanings.definition: To mark or spot with irregularly shaped spots or blots.
meanings.sent1: She was splotching the paper with colorful paints.
meanings.sent2: The artist splotched the canvas with different hues.
meanings.sent3: The cat splotched the floor with muddy paw prints.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions splotched her face with tears.
meanings.sent5: The rain splotching the window made a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: A blotch or spot of irregular shape.
meanings.sent1: There was a splotching of ink on the page.
meanings.sent2: The splotching on the wall looked like a map.
meanings.sent3: The splotching on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The splotching on the leaf resembled a tiny island.
meanings.sent5: The splotching on her dress stood out in the crowd.
